bullets: Partnered with Bukit Merah Secondary School to uplift 20 students from less-privileged backgrounds.
Delivered mentorship sessions focused on academics, resilience, and exposure to technology careers.
Collaborated with a team to interact with intellectually disabled students, creating weekly engagement activities.
Designed events to reinforce the school's core values, keeping sessions fresh and purposeful.
Researched effective learning methods to tailor support for each student's needs.
